0: The entryway to the apartment. A decorative floor mat and minimal coat rack mark the only flare in a nice-enough but woefully barebones apartment. Hallways leading to the bathroom and bedroom are visible, as is the open kitchen to the left.
door: A sturdy wooden door with a knobby handle. Envelopes lay scattered about the floor under the mail slot and a padlock appears to be missing.
doorat: A sturdy wooden door with a knobby handle. Envelopes lay scattered about the floor under the mail slot and a padlock appears to be missing.
doorunder: Light from the hallway spills in through the crack under the door.
floor_mat: "Enjoy Your Time In Orbit" is written in bold letters on the mat. The phrase is barely legible beneath the layers of dirt and dust.
floor_matat: "Enjoy Your Time In Orbit" is written in bold letters on the mat. The phrase is barely legible beneath the layers of dirt and dust.
floor_matunder: You grab the least filthy corner of the mat and lift. When the dust settles, you can see a small metal key laying on the floor.
floor_matempty: "Enjoy Your Time In Orbit" is written in bold letters on the mat. The phrase is barely legible beneath the layers of dirt and dust.
floor_matemptyat: "Enjoy Your Time In Orbit" is written in bold letters on the mat. The phrase is barely legible beneath the layers of dirt and dust.
floor_matemptyunder: You grab the least filthy corner of the mat and lift. When the dust settles, you can see the spot on the floor where the small key was.
coat_rack: Four rounded metal hooks protrude from a wooden plank in the wall. The hanger closest to the door looks worn, though there is no coat on it, nor any other hook.
coat_rackat: Four rounded metal hooks protrude from a wooden plank in the wall. The hanger closest to the door looks worn, though there is no coat on it, nor any other hook.
